mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.ad_position_id AS "adPosition.id", a.title AS "title", a.description AS "description", a.effect AS "effect", a.end_date AS "endDate", a.begin_date AS "beginDate", a.is_forever AS "isForever", a.is_autoplay AS "isAutoplay", a.height AS "height", a.width AS "width", a.pop_height AS "popHeight", a.pop_width AS "popWidth", a.location_top AS "locationTop", a.location_left AS "locationLeft", a.content_type AS "contentType", a.path AS "path", a.url AS "url", a.content AS "content", a.is_show AS "isShow", a.sort AS "sort", a.side AS "side", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag" ,adp.name as "adPosition.name" ,adp.ad_type AS "adType"
